caption.p: In vitro characterization of recombinant SgSTPS enzymes using FPP or GPP as a substrate. (A) GC-MS chromatograms for SgSTPS1. Peak 1, isocaryophillene; Peak 2, β-caryophyllene; Peak 3, humulene. (B) GC-MS chromatograms for SgSTPS2. Peak 1, elemene isomer; Peak 2, α-copaene; Peak 3, β-elemene; Peak 4, ylangene; Peak 5, β-copaene; Peak 6, isogermacrene D; Peak 7, γ-cadinene; Peak 8, γ-muurolene; Peak 9, germacrene D; Peak 10, bicyclogermacrene; Peak 11, γ-amorphene; Peak 12, cadina-1(10),4-diene; Peak 13, linalool; Peak 14, geranyl methyl ether; Peak 15, geraniol.
